fetch.user_auth: SELECT username, displayname, password FROM user WHERE username=?
fetch.user_id: SELECT id FROM user WHERE username=?
fetch.user_name: SELECT displayname FROM user WHERE id=?
fetch.post_url_path: SELECT url_path FROM post WHERE url_path=?

create.user: INSERT INTO user (username, displayname, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
create.post: INSERT INTO post (title, content, description, programming_language, publisher_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
